comment: DO NOT TAKE THIS PROFESSOR. She didn't participate in her own course. I would give her a 0 if possible. She gave a link for a website and everything was on that. The final is worth 30% of your grade and you have to pay for it as well as having it proctored (the other exams were not on lockdown) Save yourself the trouble and take someone else
Awful professor ! Makes you pay to take the final exam ! Definitely dont recommend taking her also her emails are passive aggressive. 0/10 RUN
I took her online DO NOT TAKE HER ONLINE. Her way of "teaching" is a link to an online textbook and Kahn academy videos she has 0 involvement with her class.

Professor Rushton is non-responsive, predominantly absent, and either does not know the material or prefers what is provided to her by her department over any actual educating. None, and I mean NONE of the course material is taught. You have to buy the textbook and use it as your sole source of information because she will not get back to you.

This might have been the worst class I have taken at KSU. This professor was so absent, I dont even know what she looks like. My only help was youtube throughout the semester. 2 discussion posts are mandatory each week, her attendance rules are outrageous, and when you email her, she gives you the run around.

DO NOT TAKE THIS CLASS ONLINE. We have to buy a proctoring service. In this service, you can't use SCRATCH PAPER. She is terrible at answering important emails, and math in general is hard when nobody is there to help. Definitely do not recommend taking this professor online.
rating_tags: Lots of homework--Accessible outside class--Skip class? You won't pass.

comment: I have never had an Instructor not connected as mush as her. She only gets involved by contacting the Math Dept. She doesn't know Aleks at all. She hasn't reviewed nor does she know how to navigate Aleks, you can tell talking to her. This is SELF TAUGHT! Don't take her class, its the worst experience you can have to learn Math. She sucks!
rating_tags: Skip class? You won't pass.--Test heavy

comment: She did not get involved with the class whatsoever. Be warned. You will receive two practice tests. Only 3/4 of those questions will be on your actual test. You WILL have questions on the test that you have not seen before. I kept up with the homework every week and without fail there was at least one or two questions we never worked on. Avoid.

Took this class online. I dont really see why they say shes teaching this class. Everything is done on your own through MyMathLab. Weekly discussion posts for attendance, where we all basically just say the material is easy. Forgot to do it 60% of the time. If youre not a math person, I wouldnt recommend.
I did online with mymathlab. Takes days to reply to emails. Sometimes doesnt reply at all. If you do take her, go to tutoring a lot. Shes not responsive. I recommend not taking her.

She was ok. I had her online class and whenever I emailed her I had to send the same exact email twice in order for her to answer. The only attendance grade is the final at the end of the semester. Make sure you pay attention to due dates for tests, homeworks, and discussion posts. I am a math person so I didn't have to read the book.

Professor Rushton is not helpful at all. Doesn't interact with students at all. The discussion board is for explaining or noting any problems you may encountered but she does not respond to students or give any feedback. I am aware that this is an online course but she doesn't provide any materials . DO NOT TAKE HER!
rating_tags: LOTS OF HOMEWORK--TEST HEAVY--Tests are tough

comment: All through my math lab, she does not provide lectures so use youtube. I would rather do this than go to a class, it's more tedious than hard. These reviews almost made me take a different prof but It was ok and I am taking her again in the spring. you won't hear from her so PUT THE SCHEDULE IN YOUR PHONE AND REMIND YOURSELF ESP FOR TEST DATES

don't let the reviews scare you ,it was fine. All in MML. 2 discussions posts every 5 days t; this is where youre questions will be answered by other students and give you cushion points. She has literally never posted an announcement EVER so you wont hear from her at all. Don't take if your forgetful or cant teach yourself

2 discussions & hws a week where you post twice and that constitutes a ton of your grade so if you can't keep up or are forgetful find an in person class. She doesn't talk to you ever or post announcements, reminders of tests, anything like that. these reviews made me nervous but you'll be fine if you can teach yourself basic math in my math lab

She was a great professor, I took her online and passed with a "B". I did not buy the book.  Discussion boards are easy just make sure you post on time.  Homework, Discussion Boards, 5 Test and a Final make up your overall grade. The Final is on campus.  I would recommend her.
rating_tags: Gives good feedback--Clear grading criteria--EXTRA CREDIT

comment: Math really isn't my thing but she made us do a lot of unnecessary work. In addition to doing the mymathlab homework you have to do discussion post on d2l for each section. Write one post one day answer & answers someones question then on another day do the same thing or else you will receive  a 50. It might not sound like much but it truly is.
All work Is done on mymathlab. She has little or no contact with the students. NO NOTES OR PRACTICE WORK.  DO NOT TAKE CARE...

Worst class I've taken in my college career. The "teacher" doesn't teachexplain anything but just refers you to one of her useless resource folders on D2L if you ask a question. No announcements on tests, so constantly check MML. She is bad about responding to emails, and if she does it doesn't answer all your questions. Be ready to teach yourself

Very difficult to get help from her. Little email correspondence at all! Homework and discussions count, they are essential to pass. However, tests have sufficient time to reference your notes (keep some) and plan to use youtube or an outside source if you need help.

She is a great professor. Easy! I enjoy using Mymathlab because it's much easier than going in to class face to face. You get an optional project to replace a low test grade. You get a review that you can do to add 5 points to the final exam. Great teacher! Easy A. Take her online instead of face to face.

If you want an A look elsewhere. This was online but 35 percent of the grade was from the IMPOSSIBLE final. She gave a 70 quest. review and used the concepts for less than 1/3 of the test-- why would you purposely tell your students to study one thing if you're going to pull concepts from elsewhere? She gave me a B I give her an F. Infuriating clas

I took this class online, and I am not really good at math, but as long as you do the homeworks and discussion posts I think you'd be fine! The tests are similar to the homeworks too! She was also very good about answering my emails and offering help. I think it was a overall good online class for trig :)

Online class. ABSOLUTELY loved this class! It was my easiest class and all I had to do was self teach myself through homework and the text book. I would not recommend this class to anyone that has a hard time understanding math or cannot teach themselves.
she is not a good professor would not recommend any one to take this class if ur donot know any thing about maths. she will not help y.
Class confusing, online not fun, no help and very very frustrating.

Online Class. Teacher was very helpful through emails and webct. Don't wait until the last minute to do assignments, so that way if you have questions she can respond. Can't expect her to help you the night before. I enjoyed the class and the HW and quizes really prepared you for midterm and final.
this was an online class I took over the summer. This was a horrible experience. She usually takes a long time to get back to emails. If you struggle in math I would not take this class.

I also enjoy math and never had a problem with getting A. I studied all of the topics of this course in high school so I was sure to get another A. Instead I got a B and hated this online class. The teacher was not helpful at all and graded unfairly. The following semester I took Math 1106 (also online) with another teacher and of course got an A.

I did not like her grading methods. I am very good at math and got a B because she substracted points for everything she did not like, even when I put some additional information which were correct but not asked for. 1101 is not that hard but take another techer if you want a good grade. I took 1106 online with someone else and got an A.

Tests were just plain tough; Taught material like the class was a piece of cake, but requires brand new book and only uses the CD; nice lady, but then on quizzes and tests new material would pop up; take another teacher if possible
